title: Free Composition
goal: Demonstrate unrestricted fluency in extended writing.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Quick review of all major tools:

Category Examples
Structure cu, .i, place structure
Tanru blanu gerku, bo, ke
Abstraction nu, du'u, tu'a
Connectives .e, je, gi'e, ge...gi
Tense pu, ca, ba, ki, roi
Attitudinals .ui, .oi, .a'o
Sumtcita mu'i, bu'u, pi'o, bau

Free Writing Exercise (10+ min)

Your Task

Write continuously in Lojban for 10 minutes.

Choose any topic:

  • Your life and activities
  • A story (real or fictional)
  • An explanation of something
  • Your opinions on a topic
  • A plan for the future
  • Teaching someone about Lojban

Guidelines

  • Use as many grammar structures as naturally fit
  • Don't worry about perfection â€” focus on flow
  • Include emotions, opinions, and details
  • Aim for 100+ words

Possible Structure

  1. Introduction (what you'll discuss)
  2. Main content (details, events, opinions)
  3. Conclusion (summary, feelings, future)
Example: My Lojban Journey 
.i ca mi ba tavla fi lo nu mi cilre la .jbobau.

.i pu ki mi co'a cilre ze'a lo panomoi jeftu
.i mi na djuno lo du'u la .jbobau. cu mo
.i .ue mi pu jinvi lo du'u ri nandu sai

.i ku'i mi reroi ro djedi tadni
.i ba bo mi co'a jimpe lo gismu
.i .ua mi djuno lo du'u lo bangu cu logji

.i ca mi ka'e tavla bau la .jbobau.
.i mi ka'e ciska lo lisri
.i mi ka'e tcidu lo cukta
.i .ui sai mi gleki

.i pe'i lo nu cilre bangu cu vajni
.i ki'u lo nu do ka'e tavla lo drata prenu
.i .e'o do ji'a cilre la .jbobau.

.i mi ba ki ze'u tadni
.i mi djica lo nu certu
.i .a'o mi ba certu

.i ki'e la .jbobau.
.i ki'e lo ctuca
.i .ui co'o

(Now I will talk about learning Lojban. In the past, I started learning during the 10th week. I didn't know what Lojban was. Wow, I thought it was very difficult! But I studied twice every day. Then I started understanding gismu. Aha, I know that the language is logical! Now I can speak in Lojban. I can write stories. I can read books. Very happy, I'm glad! In my opinion, learning languages is important. Because you can talk to different people. Please, you also learn Lojban! I will study for a long time (future). I want to be skilled. Hopefully I will be skilled. Thanks to Lojban. Thanks to the teachers. Happy, goodbye!)

Self-Assessment (1-2 min)

After writing, check:

  • Used multiple tenses?
  • Used attitudinals?
  • Used connectives?
  • Used abstractions?
  • Expressed opinions?
  • Natural flow?

Today's Goal

Free composition demonstrates fluency:

  • No prompts
  • No exercises
  • Just expression

Summary

You demonstrated unrestricted Lojban fluency through extended free writing.

Tomorrow preview: Final self-assessment and next steps.
